title: Ethan151
author: Ethan151
content: The reasons why so many persons invest in bitcoin is the depreciation, centralization and the appreciative aspect  in bitcoin. This stages are very important to traders or exchangers. it’s a medium of efficient, crypto currency has been a life change in recent years, it has been a great value  for storing assets, commodities and currency. These qualities attract to those who believe In future bitcoin. Crypto help those who have issues with hyperinflation..

comments.author: Z-tight
comments.body: Quote from: Ethan151 on June 14, 2022, 02:05:11 PMThe reasons why so many persons invest in bitcoin is the depreciation, centralization and the appreciative aspect  in bitcoin.Bitcoin is not centralized, it is decentralized. People buy bitcoin for mainly two purposes, to speculate and to use it as money. People who want to speculate buy and hold it for as long as possible, people who use it as money exchange it for commodities and services.Quote from: Ethan151 on June 14, 2022, 02:05:11 PMit has been a great value  for storing assets, commodities and currency. These qualities attract to those who believe In future bitcoin. Crypto help those who have issues with hyperinflation.. Bitcoin is a good hedge for storing inflationary currencies, but bitcoin is not a store of value per se, it does not hold value like conventional assets like gold, but if you want something to give you higher profits many years after, for hedging your money with it, bitcoin is the best asset for that, it is volatile and it might lose value in the meantime, but in the long run you will get profits bigger than most assets can give.

comments.author: taufik123
comments.body: The reason I often hear why many buy bitcoin is because Bitcoin is only considered a speculative asset, has high price fluctuations that will provide faster returns and vice versa.For those who believe in bitcoin and not just about price fluctuations, but about the technology, of course they will buy and keep it or use it for transactions that use bitcoin.Bitcoin becomes a good investment, but in the end we return to our own confidence whether bitcoin will be a good store of value or not for the long term. Bitcoin is decentralized and transparent so that no one has complete control over it. resistant to inflation, but has a high risk of decline in value.

comments.author: Daniel91
comments.body: The simplest and shortest answer here is that people invest in crypto because they hope to make more money than by investing in classic stocks, and unlike the classic stock market here they do not need brokers.Another important reason to invest in bitcoin is anonymity because no one knows the owner of the digital wallet and the state does not have access to your digital funds.Digital currencies are a common good, they are decentralized, without the control of financial regulators and so it should remain.Today everyone wants financial freedom and crypto is currently the easiest way to do it. As for protection against hyperinflation, I'm not sure that bitcoin can help in the short term.

comments.author: hugeblack
comments.body: Bitcoin is an ideal solution to one of the problems of inflation, which is the inflation resulting from mismanagement by governments represented in the random printing of money (increased supply) and thus the devaluation of the currency.Inflation can have several causes and all traditional solutions may fail to solve them, so even Bitcoin may fail in that if inflation has other causes such as inflation due to supply chains, energy crisis, stagflation and other problems.The good side is that governments often mismanage money badly over a period of 10 to 30 years, so in any case, Bitcoin will be a good long-term investment.

comments.author: KingsDen
comments.body: There are reasons for investing in bitcoin based on the status of the investor or the environment. 1. Some persons purchase bitcoin in order to survive their daily needs. They buy bitcoin and pray it will increase in few months and they withdraw the profits for feeding, paying of bills, paying of rent and lots more.2. Some have money and living well, they buy bitcoin hoping to be more wealthy in a decades time.3. Some buy bitcoin because they want to escape the inflation hiting their countries. 4. Some purchase bitcoin because they want to be able to control their wealth and manage their money without third-party. Amongst all, bitcoin solves different problems to different people.

comments.author: qwertyup23
comments.body: Quote from: Ethan151 on June 14, 2022, 02:05:11 PMThe reasons why so many persons invest in bitcoin is the depreciation, centralization and the appreciative aspect  in bitcoin. This stages are very important to traders or exchangers. it’s a medium of efficient, crypto currency has been a life change in recent years, it has been a great value  for storing assets, commodities and currency. These qualities attract to those who believe In future bitcoin. Crypto help those who have issues with hyperinflation.. You missed something, OP. Bitcoin is a decentralized currency in which its existence solely reflects in a public ledger being controlled by nobody. One of the few reasons on why the government avoids integrating BTC to their current financial model is due to its decentralized nature- meaning it cannot be controlled by them. While this may be the case, some countries limit the transacting of BTC by implementing rules and laws against it. Cryptocurrencies have this certain aspect that will help them become relevant in the future. I do consider them as the future of transactions given the fact that the world is slowly shifting to digitalized payments. Though this kind of transaction may be the ideal form, its full integration would take maybe tens to hundreds of years to come.
